title: The Opening of Parliament House
creator_credit: Paul Montgomery, Michael Fitzpatrick and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: With archival footage showing the opening of the old Parliament House and all the splendour of the historic opening of Australia’s new Parliament House, this video is a souvenir of a great occasion and a permanent record of a unique event. It includes the Governor General’s welcome to Her Majesty the Queen, the Honour Guard, a tour of the magnificent new building with its great architectural and engineering achievements and the opening ceremony itself.
